title: COBOL Colleague™
description: COBOL Colleague™ is a new tool for aiding in COBOL application understanding, refactoring, and more.

title: B2B Communications Enhancements
description:
Enhancements to a full-stack application (RESTful backend, and Angular front-end) abstraction layer on top of an industry-leading business-to-business communications platform to support the deployment of communications configurations to multiple infrastructure nodes and environments.

  • Spring Boot backend RESTful API
    • Virtual Machine Apache Server deployment via Jenkins pipeline
    • Mockito mocking of services for testing
    • JUnit4 Unit and Integration tests
  • Angular front-end single-page application
    • Virtual Machine Apache Server deployment via Jenkins pipeline

title: API Validation Service
description:
Validate an application's OpenAPI 3.X document against established company standards which were encapsulated in JSON format. Node.js CLI prototype and production deployed containerized Java Spring Boot REST API service integrated into build pipeline to ensure compliance.

  • Spring Boot RESTful API
  • OpenShift container service deployment via Jenkins pipeline
  • Mockito mocking of services for testing
  • JUnit4 unit and integration tests
  • Integrated into Jenkins pipeline to validate any projects with registered OpenAPI endpoint

title: API Standards
description: Research and document industry standards for RESTful API development to provide guidance in developing a company-wide policy. Provide guidance to adopt OpenApi 3.1 standard.

title: Example Project for Test Frameworks
description:
Created a sample Spring Boot Thymeleaf project to demonstrate the use of an enterprise test framework for unit and integration testing of a web MVC application.

  • Spring Boot Thymeleaf application
  • OpenShift container application deployment via Jenkins pipeline
  • Wiremock mocking of RESTful services for integration testing
  • Cucumber definition of test suites
  • Selenium frontend tests
  • JUnit4 unit and integration tests
